titleStmt.title: The fortunate change: being a panegyrick to His Sacred Maiesty, King Charls the second, immediately on his coronation, being the 23. of April 1661. By Carew Reynell, Esq;
titleStmt.author: Reynell, Carew, 1636-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Henry Herringman, at the Anchor in the Lower walk in the New Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Differs from the second edition in having a comma after "second" in title.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Anchor in the Lower walk in the New Exchange
